info: Operating consistently in accordance with a strong set on moral values. Meeting everyone with respect and treating everyone the same.
Split difficult tasks into simpler ones, then work together to complete them faster. Develop specialised skills, so that the best person for each task can do it better and faster.
Managing our time accordingly and following schedules strictly abiding to our principles and objectives.
Supporting our communities well being, listening to criticism and working on it without judgment or any assumptions.
